<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This simple pass provides alias and mod/ref information for global values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that do not have their address taken, and keeps track of whether functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// read or write memory (are &quot;pure&quot;).  For this simple (but very common) case,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we can provide pretty accurate and useful information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38" lineLink="#acce6a0311d4d50cdf6bca7ff32a9240e"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/statistic-h/#ad6117415b93e5675d5a6c8e1855b3b2f">STATISTIC</a>(NumNonAddrTakenFunctions,</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Number of functions without address taken&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40" lineLink="#ac6a2e1275be7dcd41cad7fe03c7119b0"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/statistic-h/#ad6117415b93e5675d5a6c8e1855b3b2f">STATISTIC</a>(NumReadMemFunctions, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Number of functions that only read memory&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41" lineLink="#adf5bc7517fbafef6e17b409b2d2757ec"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/statistic-h/#ad6117415b93e5675d5a6c8e1855b3b2f">STATISTIC</a>(NumIndirectGlobalVars, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Number of indirect global objects&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An option to enable unsafe alias results from the GlobalsModRef analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When enabled, GlobalsModRef will provide no-alias results which in extremely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rare cases may not be conservatively correct. In particular, in the face of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transforms which cause asymmetry between how effective getUnderlyingObject</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is for two pointers, it may produce incorrect results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These unsafe results have been returned by GMR for many years without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// causing significant issues in the wild and so we provide a mechanism to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// re-enable them for users of LLVM that have a particular performance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sensitivity and no known issues. The option also makes it easy to evaluate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the performance impact of these results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="#a0782a22109da6d2417d0f8938a8aab5c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a0782a22109da6d2417d0f8938a8aab5c">EnableUnsafeGlobalsModRefAliasResults</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;enable-unsafe-globalsmodref-alias-results&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The mod/ref information collected for a particular function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We collect information about mod/ref behavior of a function here, both in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// general and as pertains to specific globals. We only have this detailed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// information when we know &#42;something&#42; useful about the behavior. If we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// saturate to fully general mod/ref, we remove the info for the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/globalsaaresult/functioninfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/globalsaaresult/functioninfo">GlobalsAAResult::FunctionInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;const GlobalValue &#42;, ModRefInfo, 16&gt;</a> GlobalInfoMapType;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Build a wrapper struct that has 8-byte alignment. All heap allocations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// should provide this much alignment at least, but this makes it clear we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// specifically rely on this amount of alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">alignas</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(8) AlignedMap &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AlignedMap() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AlignedMap(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlignedMap &amp;Arg) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    GlobalInfoMapType Map;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Pointer traits for our aligned map.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlignedMap &#42;getFromVoidPointer(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLowBitsAvailable = 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">alignof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(AlignedMap) &gt;= (1 &lt;&lt; NumLowBitsAvailable),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;AlignedMap insufficiently aligned to have enough low bits.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The bit that flags that this function may read any global. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// chosen to mix together with ModRefInfo bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: This assumes ModRefInfo lattice will remain 4 bits!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FunctionInfo.getModRefInfo() masks out everything except ModRef so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this remains correct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; MayReadAnyGlobal = 4 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Checks to document the invariants of the bit packing here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">((MayReadAnyGlobal &amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea6524b183b5cd0850f2cff6d30d581af9">ModRefInfo::ModRef</a>)) == 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ModRef and the MayReadAnyGlobal flag bits overlap.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(((MayReadAnyGlobal | </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea6524b183b5cd0850f2cff6d30d581af9">ModRefInfo::ModRef</a>)) &gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 AlignedMapPointerTraits::NumLowBitsAvailable) == 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Insufficient low bits to store our flag and ModRef info.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// All of the information is encoded into a single pointer, with a three bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// integer in the low three bits. The high bit provides a flag for when this</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the pointer, when non-null, points to a map from GlobalValue to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AnalyzeIndirectGlobalMemory - We found an non-address-taken global variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which holds a pointer type.  See if the global always points to non-aliased</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// heap memory: that is, all initializers of the globals store a value known</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to be obtained via a noalias return function call which have no other use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Further, all loads out of GV must directly use the memory, not store the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointer somewhere.  If this is true, we consider the memory pointed to by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// GV to be owned by GV and can disambiguate other pointers from it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GlobalsAAResult::AnalyzeIndirectGlobalMemory(GlobalVariable &#42;GV) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of values related to the allocation of the memory, f.e. the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value produced by the noalias call and any casts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;Value &#42;&gt; AllocRelatedValues;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the initializer is a valid pointer, bail.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Constant &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a0698d5bcabbfbca4f56a9d7a81cecb25">getInitializer</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;isNullValue())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the user list of the global.  If we find anything other than a direct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load or store, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (User &#42;U : GV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadInst &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pointer loaded from the global can only be used in simple ways:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we allow addressing of it and loading storing to it.  We do &#42;not&#42; allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// storing the loaded pointer somewhere else or passing to a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AnalyzeUsesOfPointer(LI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loaded pointer escapes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Could try some IP mod/ref of the loaded pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoreInst &#42;SI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(U)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Too hard to analyze.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Analyze all uses of the allocation.  If any of them are used in a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember that this allocation is related to the indirect global.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraphnode/#abc0ebbee3aae4365ed714cb589fd4a5d">CallGraphNode::iterator</a> CI = SCC&#91;i&#93;-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a2fdb10193ae65fe59b4d8df288044864">begin</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = SCC&#91;i&#93;-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : PN-&gt;incoming&#95;values()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Inputs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Inputs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All inputs were known to be no-alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are particular cases where we can conclude no-alias between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a non-addr-taken global and some other underlying object. Specifically,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a non-addr-taken global is known to not be escaped from any function. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also incorrect for a transformation to introduce an escape of a global in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a way that is observable when it was not there previously. One function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being transformed to introduce an escape which could possibly be observed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (via loading from a global or the return value for example) within another</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function is never safe. If the observation is made through non-atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations on different threads, it is a data-race and UB. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// observation is well defined, by being observed the transformation would have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changed program behavior by introducing the observed escape, making it an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invalid transform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This property does require that transformations which &#42;temporarily&#42; escape</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a global that was not previously escaped, prior to restoring it, cannot rely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the results of GMR::alias. This seems a reasonable restriction, although</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// currently there is no way to enforce it. There is also no realistic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimization pass that would make this mistake. The closest example is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a transformation pass which does reg2mem of SSA values but stores them into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// global variables temporarily before restoring the global variable&#39;s value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This could be useful to expose &quot;benign&quot; races for example. However, it seems</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reasonable to require that a pass which introduces escapes of global</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variables in this way to either not trust AA results while the escape is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// active, or to be forced to operate as a module pass that cannot co-exist</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with an alias analysis such as GMR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GlobalsAAResult::isNonEscapingGlobalNoAlias(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GlobalValue &#42;GV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order to know that the underlying object cannot alias the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-addr-taken global, we must know that it would have to be an escape.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Thus if the underlying object is a function argument, a load from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a global, or the return of a function, it cannot alias. We can also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recurse through PHI nodes and select nodes provided all of their inputs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resolve to one of these known-escaping roots.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallPtrSet&lt;const Value &#42;, 8&gt; Visited;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallVector&lt;const Value &#42;, 8&gt; Inputs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Visited.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Inputs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;Input = Inputs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InputGV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalValue&gt;</a>(Input)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one input is the very global we&#39;re querying against, then we can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conclude no-alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InputGV == GV)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Distinct GlobalVariables never alias, unless overriden or zero-sized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: The condition can be refined, but be conservative for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;GVar = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(GV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InputGVar = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(InputGV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GVar &amp;&amp; InputGVar &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !GVar-&gt;isDeclaration() &amp;&amp; !InputGVar-&gt;isDeclaration() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !GVar-&gt;isInterposable() &amp;&amp; !InputGVar-&gt;isInterposable()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;GVType = GVar-&gt;getInitializer()-&gt;getType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;InputGVType = InputGVar-&gt;getInitializer()-&gt;getType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GVType-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a8ad67a33bae235fe3cca1c3e5a91ed2d">isSized</a>() &amp;&amp; InputGVType-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a8ad67a33bae235fe3cca1c3e5a91ed2d">isSized</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (DL.getTypeAllocSize(GVType) &gt; 0) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (DL.getTypeAllocSize(InputGVType) &gt; 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively return false, even though we could be smarter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (e.g. look through GlobalAliases).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Argument&gt;</a>(Input) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CallInst&gt;</a>(Input) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(Input)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Arguments to functions or returns from functions are inherently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// escaping, so we can immediately classify those as not aliasing any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-addr-taken globals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recurse through a limited number of selects, loads and PHIs. This is an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arbitrary depth of 4, lower numbers could be used to fix compile time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// issues if needed, but this is generally expected to be only be important</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for small depths.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Input)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A pointer loaded from a global would have been captured, and we know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the global is non-escaping, so no alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(LI-&gt;getPointerOperand());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a1c1b80628be0f97adf568cccacc8e8e3">isNonEscapingGlobalNoAliasWithLoad</a>(GV, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>, DL))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The load does not alias with GV.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Inputs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all the inputs to V were definitively no-alias, then V is no-alias.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalsaaresult/#a6a669878583bed7b1ce9d1328b6b247e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalsaaresult/#a6a669878583bed7b1ce9d1328b6b247e">GlobalsAAResult::invalidate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 ModuleAnalysisManager::Invalidator &amp;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// alias - If one of the pointers is to a global that we are tracking, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// other is some random pointer, we know there cannot be an alias, because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// address of the global isn&#39;t taken.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalsaaresult/#ad1af2012f83ff1c94df346bbc8ac3b6a"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult">AliasResult</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalsaaresult/#ad1af2012f83ff1c94df346bbc8ac3b6a">GlobalsAAResult::alias</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp;LocA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp;LocB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp;AAQI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the base object these pointers point to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;UV1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(LocA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a9550ce4a179e46db37f653ce28feca7a">Ptr</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#af7ce93500c8d9a8fbd0a40e461f3b780">stripPointerCastsForAliasAnalysis</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(LocB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a9550ce4a179e46db37f653ce28feca7a">Ptr</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#af7ce93500c8d9a8fbd0a40e461f3b780">stripPointerCastsForAliasAnalysis</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If either of the underlying values is a global, they may be non-addr-taken</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// globals, which we can answer queries about.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &#42;GV1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalValue&gt;</a>(UV1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &#42;GV2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalValue&gt;</a>(UV2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GV1 || GV2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the global&#39;s address is taken, pretend we don&#39;t know it&#39;s a pointer to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GV1 &amp;&amp; !NonAddressTakenGlobals.count(GV1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GV1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GV2 &amp;&amp; !NonAddressTakenGlobals.count(GV2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GV2 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the two pointers are derived from two different non-addr-taken</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// globals we know these can&#39;t alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GV1 &amp;&amp; GV2 &amp;&amp; GV1 != GV2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a863ee317b92588eb2d6878af9fc98922">AliasResult::NoAlias</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one is and the other isn&#39;t, it isn&#39;t strictly safe but we can fake</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this result if necessary for performance. This does not appear to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a common problem in practice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0782a22109da6d2417d0f8938a8aab5c">EnableUnsafeGlobalsModRefAliasResults</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a863ee317b92588eb2d6878af9fc98922">AliasResult::NoAlias</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for a special case where a non-escaping global can be used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conclude no-alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((GV1 || GV2) &amp;&amp; GV1 != GV2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &#42;GV = GV1 ? GV1 : GV2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;UV = GV1 ? UV2 : UV1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isNonEscapingGlobalNoAlias(GV, UV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a863ee317b92588eb2d6878af9fc98922">AliasResult::NoAlias</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise if they are both derived from the same addr-taken global, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can&#39;t know the two accesses don&#39;t overlap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These pointers may be based on the memory owned by an indirect global.  If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so, we may be able to handle this.  First check to see if the base pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a direct load from an indirect global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  GV1 = GV2 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(UV1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(LI-&gt;getOperand(0)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IndirectGlobals.count(GV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GV1 = GV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;LI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(UV2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(LI-&gt;getOperand(0)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IndirectGlobals.count(GV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GV2 = GV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These pointers may also be from an allocation for the indirect global.  If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so, also handle them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GV1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    GV1 = AllocsForIndirectGlobals.lookup(UV1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GV2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">    GV2 = AllocsForIndirectGlobals.lookup(UV2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we know whether the two pointers are related to indirect globals,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use this to disambiguate the pointers. If the pointers are based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different indirect globals they cannot alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GV1 &amp;&amp; GV2 &amp;&amp; GV1 != GV2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a863ee317b92588eb2d6878af9fc98922">AliasResult::NoAlias</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one is based on an indirect global and the other isn&#39;t, it isn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// strictly safe but we can fake this result if necessary for performance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This does not appear to be a common problem in practice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0782a22109da6d2417d0f8938a8aab5c">EnableUnsafeGlobalsModRefAliasResults</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((GV1 || GV2) &amp;&amp; GV1 != GV2)</span></CodeLine>
